unnormalised: Hey everyone! Any update on Jadeja's knee? Hope he recovers soon! Heard Bumrah is also out for a few weeks. Wishing them a speedy recovery, especially before the next India-Pak match! Need our boys back in form! Fingers crossed and Jai Hind!
